attributes.action: Give all UK voters the right to vote in Scottish, Welsh, and Irish Parliaments.
attributes.background:
Where Regional legislation affects the whole of the UK the UK voter should have the same rights as the Regional voter.
Similarly when the UK Elected Government passes legislation , dependent regions should have no extra powers or influence.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
